website_summaries.verdict: Great for enjoying some of the biggest games available, the Blaze provides PC gamers a solid foundation that is easy to upgrade as you need it.
pros: Capable of playing the newest AAA games
cons: A good entry-level gaming PC, but there are many more powerful options out there

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm pleased with this purchase but not adding the final star due to 1. It did not come with 16gb ram like listed on description, instead it came with 8gb ram 2. It did not come 1tb hdd, instead it came with 500gb ssd
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Solid Rig to Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Order this directly from SkyTech. Received well before actual delivery date. The outer shipping box had hole in it but the Computer box was intact. Rig came with Mouse/Keyboard both light up. Installing was a breeze. Had to update some of the software. WiFi adapter included but i have my Rig hardwired/Ethernet Cable for faster speeds. LED Fans are VERY Smooth and QUIET. Came with Gigabyte 580 8GB Graphics Card, AsRock MB, Ryzen 1200 Processor. Will upgrade in the future. Overall solid Rig. 10/23/2018 - I added Samsung EVO 250GB SSD. Rig running smooth as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Derek M.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This gaming rig has everything you need to get going on most AAA titles. Haven't tried anything hardcore graphics wise yet, but the games I am playing are smooth and with no issues (lag, stuttering, etc). Came with keyboard and mouse, but the mouse I wouldn't recommend using (pretty cheap plastic thing that just lights up and looks cool; I have a simple wireless mouse that performs better). Overall this pc is well worth it at a great price. Plus with how the motherboard is set up by amd, you can always upgrade to a later model cpu in the ryzen series. Lighting effects are pretty cool and it's super quiet. Love this rig!
customer_reviews.author: K. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Its dope but...
customer_reviews.text: Its dope af and can run most triple a tittle games at high settings but i have a few problems with it. First, it lags sometimes for no reason and second, it flashes green on my moniter, and third, sometimes apps wont open and i have to restart it. Its really anoyying but overall its great for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Looks Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: So far really happy with this computer! This is my first gaming computer but I got it for graphic design use but so far played more games. Works amazingly on CSGO and league of legends. Only thing is I never got the mouse or a power cable when it got delivered so I had to go out and buy one before I could even get started.
customer_reviews.author: William Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: After 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this PC for a month now and I've really liked it and the price is solid for everything you get. I really like the customization for the fan lights and it runs games great at high settings. What I will say is the mouse is really cheap and it's pretty bad of a mouse. The keyboard looks nice with the light but its a cheap keyboard that is not that good for typing. Thats my thoughts on the pc!
customer_reviews.author: Hiyam

customer_reviews.title: Quality pc, stylish and powerfull.
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, silent, and quite a bit of power for what it costs.. runs my oculus rift smoothly, have never experienced a noticeable drop in image quality or frame rate. Only crash was semi-intentional, pushing the pc and oculus to their limits to see just how much they could handle, which is quite a bit. You could definitely build your own rig that was slightly better for a little under the cost of this, but for a pre built, this met and exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Constant Blue Screens
customer_reviews.text: It has only been five months since we ordered this and it pretty much is ueless already. Saving up to get it to a shop now I guess. It is a pretty computer but beyond that it is actually junk. I haven't had any problems buying things from Amazon ever, and I am still using the ACER PREDATOR computer I purchased online about six years ago with no problems at all, this computer has been nothing but problems starting with the usb slots all breaking right away lol. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly b.

customer_reviews.title: Sky tech gaming is good gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: My computer came on time. the Box was a little deigned up but the computer itself was fine the keyboard and mouse or good to. I've ran only two games so far everything Seems OK.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Hey You Guys missed Power Cable
customer_reviews.text: Hey you missed Power cable. When I received it there was no power cable. Anyway I bought it in walmart. how could I wait few days more because of it? at $ 13 and 50 minutes round trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Won't even work at first try.
customer_reviews.text: My monitor won't even turn on, I tried contacting but no responsed. I can see the fans moving and the lights, but no signal is received by my monitor. Worst purchase ever. A word of advice don't purchase this. I was charged $134 for the restocking fee, so I lost $134 for nothing in return. Never buying anything from This company again.
customer_reviews.author: Abdel

customer_reviews.title: WiFi defective
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this would probably be a good system, and well worth the price, of you don't need to use a WiFi connection. The built-in WiFi was dead on arrival, and it also could not recognize a USB WiFi antennae - one that worked, and is working, perfectly well in another system. The only support advice was to update drivers, which I did after moving it to another room and using a wired connection. It didn't help, so I returned the unit. Otherwise, it was solid, sell-made for the price point, and surprisingly quiet.
customer_reviews.author: EverettW

customer_reviews.title: Bad pc
customer_reviews.text: Crashes about 3 times a day. Very disappointed. Nothing is more agrovating then a PC crash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many concerns
customer_reviews.text: When I received this computer, there was a dent on the front where the fans are and the front ports (usb, audio) don’t seem to function well. Other than that, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Legend Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money but...
customer_reviews.text: I received this computer a few days ago and gave it a good once over. Been running it nonstop since the day I received it and have had no issues with operation or function. The only problem I had was the power cable that came with it was for a new zealand outlet. This product is being sold in the US. Fortunately, I have extra power cables around from previous computers that work just fine. If I didn't, Id have to go out and buy one or wait for the company to send me a replacement. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how snappy this computer is. The thing looks great on my desk and it actually has exceeded my expectations. I got the computer for 4k video editing and it has no problems with that at all. I would recommend this computer to someone with the same type of useage. The only thing I can fault on this system is the left shift key throws up a weird character randomly along with the other key I'm hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Nightpainter308

customer_reviews.title: Bought my daughter a new gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: We are both loving this computer so far. We've had no issues. Always remember to check wiring after a computer is shipped to you as something may always come lose when being bounced around. There was one loose cable up towards the top of the motherboard. I did this check when I removed the foam insert. Once using the pc it's been fast and everything my daughter wanted. She loves the rgb lights. Thank you for building an amazing pc. If I ever decide to buy a new pc it will be from this company. The loose wire wasn't a complaint. Just a reminder to check wiring before setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Darick Petrik

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a awesome desktop, great graphics, and the lights on the desktop, keyboard, and mouse are awesome my kids love that about the desktop. The only thing I didn’t like was that VGA port didn’t work for my monitor, I read the quick setup guide and it said to use the HDMI port on the graphics card which is fine but I had buy a adapter with a female VGA connector and HDMI female plug for my monitor which arrived today and once I connected everything i was ready to play MechWarrior 5 Mercenaries and it’s awesome. I have already recommended this brand for my gamer friends at work
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming Computer for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at different aspects of this PC to upgrade in order to make it optimal for my gaming and work needs. The video card is great and the computer runs very quickly. The only upgrade I needed to make immediately was upgrading the 8gb of ram to 16gb (which was only about $70). This PC has treated me well for the first 8 months. I'd highly recommend purchasing this PC.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G.

customer_reviews.title: It's a win in my book.
customer_reviews.text: This PC checked all the boxes in my search for a new computer. I actually didn't purchase it for gaming, but it's an added bonus. I needed something to run GNS3 reliably, and this does the job. I'm also very pleased with how well it runs Steam games. The instructions for setup were detailed and helpful. It seems like a company that stands behind the product. I'm very happy with my purchase thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: It's a great computer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this desktop about a month. It comes with the desktop, mouse and keyboard you see in the photo. No monitor. I bought that separate (and actually do not recommend but that's another review, for another day) I play World of Warcraft on this computer every night after work. The graphics are amazing, the game play is fast, no choppiness. It's comparable to my wife's HP Omen which is several hundred dollars more, so I'd say I got this at a steal. I haven't had to utilize their tech support yet, so I can't comment on that but so far I am really happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.S. Byron

customer_reviews.title: nice spec but ok quality
customer_reviews.text: It has been about a month and a half since I bought this. So far it runs great. I love the price for its spec. It's powerful enough for most of popular games, however, I am disappointed with its hardware quality. Power button fell off on the second day... It came with a broken mouse. (I didn't even bother to call customer service for a replacement because I didn't want the same cheap mouse. I just went out and got a Logitech mouse.) Keyboard also feels very cheap. After a month of use, letters on the keyboard start fading... starting with "W"...
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Ok box but junky keyboard
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The tower is pre-assembled which is nice and does ship well with the way it is packaged. The box is double-boexed which will help with weather if set outside while you come home. However, the outside box is not a great disguise if you are in a worrying area. Also, the keyboard is 100% junk. It will pipe character input randomly. So, once you get this box do not use the keyboard. Again, it is pure junk. I have bought two of these boxes and each keyboard was junk with inputting random pipes. If you don't know what a character pipe is do a quick google for Bash Scripting Pipping. So far, no other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MoonyThinker

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Support
customer_reviews.text: The support from Skytech is horrible. I have emailed them several days in a row for over a week and gotten no response. The machine is slow having an mechanical drive in it and when trying to upgrade I can't get the Windows 10 activation code from them. The keyboard and mouse were both dead on arrival at initial delivery and then the replacement keyboard was dead on arrival but the mouse worked. The keyboard and mouse reminded me of a 2 year old's play toy construction wise. I would NOT recommend purchasing from this company.
customer_reviews.author: JHB

customer_reviews.title: First desktop
customer_reviews.text: Used this mostly for really basic games (WoW, League), but I've got a buddy who bought the same one and runs Mount & Blade II on it and hasn't said he's had any real issues. Decent components for a first computer. My only real recommendation would be to pick up some extra storage. With so many modern games taking 80GB or more of space, you'll use up the 500GB really fast. Obviously you could get something better for the money if you build it yourself (I just built a fully new computer for a the first time, it's not really all that difficult!), but for a pre-built, this did what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I purchased this system for my son who wanted a computer that could play Fortnite primarily, but also one that he can use for school, internet, etc. It came well packaged, with a folder for all papers, easy to set up guide/directions. We had no problems getting it up and running. My son loves the cool red lights on the tower and the backlit keyboard and mouse are very sturdy and well constructed. Only a few days in but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Creel

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this computer. Bought it for the kids and they love it. Good for gaming and my son's steam account. The computer comes with a keyboard and mouse. The kids are using the keyboard, but they upgraded to a wireless mouse. I did add an SSD, Crucial, BX500 120GB and made that the windows boot drive. The machine now loads in about 11 secs and it's great. I think this is a great budget gaming computer that does everything you need and is easily upgraded. We've had it since September and there are no issues at all. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hector G

customer_reviews.title: I'd love to review this -- but I've been unable to use it for more than five minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I started this computer up with the internet going one time, ONE TIME, and it ran for exactly five minutes before giving me a blue screen. Now I get a different blue screen each time I power it on, and when I go to try and boot up in safe mode, it gets caught in a seemingly infinite automatic repair loop. I'm returning this thing, as it's not at all a good sign of what's to come. I know it's reached its destination, so I'm not sure where my refund is, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a gaming PC, so I fully admit to having no baseline to how this compares with other more expensive options, but given that I was looking for something to get me off my very-obviously-not-for-gaming laptop, this checked every box I could have asked for, at a price point I was happy to pay!
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: The speed and functionality are top notch
customer_reviews.text: So far from what I have done with this computer it has far exceeded my expectations. I haven't played any games on it, but I have streamed a few steam games over to my nvidia shield and played them that way. I am quite impressed with the speed and responsiveness of it. I bought this particularly due to the fact that if something needs replaced, I can do it without hindrance. My last computer was an hp all in one, and the mother board went out in that, this was a big step up from that and I am quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Could be better ?
customer_reviews.text: When first received while taking it out of the box I notice a rattle after further investigation found out hard drive had come lose and was bouncing around inside the tower. It only took about a two months for the system to get slow and sometimes unresponsive while playing sample games, decided to reload OS to eliminate any software issues but come to find out you get no installation disk+can't even make one+you don't even get a windows license sticker with registration key. Needless to say I have not been impress with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: JROD

customer_reviews.title: OK gaming computer, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The PC is only OK but then knew that based on the specs when it was purchased so not really a negative. Emailed customer service two weeks ago and provided the information they requested. The emailed back three days later asking for more information so I replied the next day. Been waiting 9 days for a response. Save yourself the headache and go with a different company just in case you need to work with them about an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Thantos64

customer_reviews.title: Just what i ask for works good and looks good😊
customer_reviews.text: It came with a keyboard and a nice mouse everything works good and looks good. Its worth the money and if you have problems with it freezing or crashing it's an easy fix you just got unstall the graphics card and reinstall it and problem fix 👍
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a month now
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this computer for work and gaming. I bought it because I needed at least two monitors, this one has 3. 3 is better than 2. I bought it so that I could run video along with some medium duty software simultaneously. Works great for that. Gaming wise? I’m. It sure you need more. Mine runs as well as friends computers that cost 4 times as much. So, I’m happy with it and tech support is great. I’d buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for 3D cad!
customer_reviews.text: Had to set up a workstation for home office while quarantined. SkyTech Gaming had the best deal out there. The computer is fast, quiet, and able to run Autodesk Inventor and SolidWorks 3D cad with no problems. Amazon filled the order and mistakenly sent an 8gb ram machine. I ordered a 16gb. Called SkyTech support line and they took care of me quickly and without any hassle. Highly, highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: rcrmm380

customer_reviews.title: Supbar quality overall
customer_reviews.text: Crappy, after I got the computer it lasted 3 months. The graphics card went bad, I tried to install a spare one I had and it booted after a few tries. I know I didn't pay much for it but I was expecting for it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this tower
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this because of the power. We're not using it for major gaming (Roblox/Sims/etc...) but it's so wonderfully fast! Having no idea what one should spend on a machine like this, I'm still VERY happy with this purchase. I had no idea how slow my last (4 year old) PC was until now. LOVE IT! PS: Monitor NOT included but the packaging was top notch and got a tote, keyboard and mouse, too!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Works Flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my step-son for Christmas. He was so thrilled, since it was such a huge upgrade from our old machine. So far, he can play any game he's installed smoothly: Rainbow Six Siege, Day Z, CS:GO, Insurgency Sandstorm, Left for Dead 2...and more. I was super impressed with the keyboard that comes with it---the keys are elevated and springy, great for gaming---and equally impressive was the remote-controlled fan and lighting, such a neat feature to 'show-off' to friends and family! Finally, I loved how easy it was to setup--we literally had it up-and-running in about 5-10 minutes on Christmas morning. Will definitely purchase from Skytech gaming again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Prout

customer_reviews.title: Very nice system
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad because I talked him into getting rid of his old slow apple mac mini. He is now a windows fan and will not go back. This computer fits all of his needs, very fast lots of storage and is very well made. Would highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Defectuosa
customer_reviews.text: This computer did not work from the box. Instructions for the computer says to follow the start up guide, however there was no start up guide included. I tried to search online and even on SkyTech's website but could find nothing. I called SkyTech support line and left a message with all my call back info. I still to this day have never received a phone call back. THAT is the main reason that I returned this computer La Pc no enciende, no sirve la fuente de poder llegó defectuosa.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Newman

customer_reviews.title: Epic gaming pc!
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money a fantastic build to play games on pc. It runs any game i have on max settings smooth with no problems. Everything is performing as expected im very happy over all. The shipping was fast and safely put in the box well packed and even came with a really cool bag to keep your pc in for traveling! OVERALL 10/10 will buy again Skytech Gaming is amazing and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: William Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a prebuilt
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a prebuilt computer. If you're new to PC gaming this will get you good power to run most modern games at reasonable levels, better than consoles at least. It came very safely wrapped. Too bad it didn't have different colors for the lights, only red, but it's not a big deal as you won't be looking at the lights when playing anyway. Plus, you get better stuff for your money vs competitors that gave lower processors in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: HDD wasn't plugged in.  Great computer overall.
customer_reviews.text: Received the PC in mostly good order. Unfortunately the HDD was unplugged, had to do some googling and troubleshooting to figure it out. Thankfully I'm computer saavy and was able to find the HDD and plug it back in. Would also be nice to have the oem windows 10 cd key to be able to reformat harddrive if needed. Other than those 2 things the computer looks and worked great. Plays WoW on max graphics (open world) at 100fps.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming PC for the bucks!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the computer a few days so far and it is wonderful thus far. I have only played fortnite as i made this purchase mainly for editing my (console) game play footage and image editing. This processor is fast enough for what i need to do, the computer is very quiet and runs smoothly. would definitely recommend. I will be testing it for streaming shortly and would be writing another review
customer_reviews.author: Darius J. Romer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Recently upgraded from a 9 yr old Alien-ware (pre dell ownership) that was a beast, but seriously lagging behind. was looking for a mid-range gaming PC with AMD, and I found it with this machine. Good amount of ram, great speed. Only additional mod was a 250GB SSD upgrade that was to good to pass up on Cyber Monday. Quiet fans, well ventilated and packaged well for shipping. Would recommend to anyone looking for good components, value, and speed.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Worst computer for anything ,if you want not to enjoy yourself gaming buy this , by far the worst gaming computer I've ever used I returned this hrs after plugging it in ,slower than slow, Big waste of time here ,don't be fooled by the low price,honestly I could barely open my email on it ,n that's for real..run
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mears

customer_reviews.title: Great tech support!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Starter computer for gaming that I bought for my son after lots of research. We had an issue with the computer not booting and also the WiFi card right out of the box. Tech support was amazing as I called on a Friday evening and they walked me through how to fix everything and were extremely responsive. Since that time we have had no problems and my son says it’s great to game on! The lights are super cool as well!
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Good PC worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s but a good pc just the only downfall people might find that you have to find the cables to connect to the graphic card. I switched the default card which was a 1050 TI to a RTX 2060 I had to get a different set of cable to run my games in 144hz since that card only had for Display and HDMI. Overall good product I had some issues at first but found solutions. REMINDER: You can only use it by connecting the cables to the video card.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro O. Real

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a major upgrade from my previous computer. I am not a big gamer, generally simplier games...works great. My son is a gamer and has the version before this one and it works great, so I would guess this one is even better. He was jealous when this got delivered. Fast boot up, fast processing.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Love the system for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly enjoying this system except for one thing. The fans are quite loud. It took a couple of days of constant running to get them to mellow out. Research stated that because of the firm packing and manufacturing process, it could take awhile to work off all the burrs. That seems to have happened. Their support email team did send an email back to me within 24 hours advising there was a button somewhere that will also control the fans. I have not yet heard back but I only just followed up. So far everything works for the mid level gaming that I want and I would definitely look to this company for other systems.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rig !!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy about this PC! I've never purchased a pre-built machine and was skeptical about doing so. I am glad that I did though, for sure! Very solid, stable, smooth and fast. I would definitely recommend anyone in the market for an all-round great desktop to buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use for iRacing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer specifically for iRacing. It does a fantastic job out of the box. Getting 80-85 fps straight from the box. Not sure how this compares to other games but was just what I needed. Arrived on time. Nice packaging. Plenty of tech support options included although I have not needed to use them. No bloatware on the computer which was very appreciated. Runs quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: I got it I like it
customer_reviews.text: Got the computer and had it set up in about an hour. I have been gaming on it several hours a day and lov it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great economical gaming system!
customer_reviews.text: The computer exceeded my expectations. I’ve been a long time online game player and the SkyTech Blaze was a great economical upgrade to my 9 yr old i5. Both have 16GB RAM and Nvidia graphics cards and now my games play in a whole new way. Definitely recommend for economic and performance reasons!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: My friend had recommended this computer to me based on what it had in it for the price and so far I am not disappointed. It is running amazingly. If I had to pick a single aspect that I enjoy the most, it would definitely be how quiet the fans are. I was honestly expecting them to be loud but they run very quiet. overall I definitely recommend getting it with the 1050 ti, Ryzen 5 and 16 GB RAM
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah

customer_reviews.title: Powerful budget gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Tower arrived as described, everything set up and ready to go, no issues whatsoever. The case itself is very nice, I like the tempered glass side panel. As far as gaming goes it's played everything I've thrown at it pretty much flawlessly, although most of the games I enjoy are on the low end side of things, it plays Escape From Tarkov almost maxed out with a pretty stable 60fps throughout. I almost bought a laptop with slightly lower specs at the same price, so if you're looking for a pretty midrange prebuilt machine at a price that isn't highway robbery, you could definitely do a lot worse in the same range.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The first rig I got I believe the motherboard was faulty wouldn't power up. I sent it back and about a week later they got me a new one. Came with a card showing all inspections checked out etc. Love these guys they took care of me with no hassle. They wanted to make sure I was happy and my rig worked as intended. These guys are awesome, I will be buying a couple more for my kids in the future ;) Thank You SkyTech!
customer_reviews.author: wrentrillogy

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: At his product is very reasonably priced and it works great. It is a great PC for a first timer with the ability to run pretty much every game at medium to high graphics. Between the price and gameplay i would highly recommend it to someone looking for a PC. It comes with a mouse and keyboard which both work well although i haven’t used the mouse too much.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good computer for the price, Amazon couldn't deliver the first one i ordered but they gave me credit to order another one no problem. The Nvidia GTX 1050Ti came with a Fortnite bundle, but when i entered the redeem code it said it was used already but customer support gave me a new code no hassle. All in all i'm 100% satisfied, I'm able to stream 1280x720; 1000 mbps and play League of Legends at 180+ fps on ARAM. I haven't really been playing any other games as yet, but i think this comp is a good buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: ansonanimus

customer_reviews.title: Great starter PC for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself. Very pleased with purchase. CPU is only real weak point aside from having just 8gb of ram. Already grabbed a better cpu, and more ram. Will run most games on Normal to High graphics settings, as is. Finally ran into some stuttering and fps dips playing modern warfare on normal settings today. Knowing what I do now, I would purchase this PC again. SkyTech did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design, user friendly PC
customer_reviews.text: Comes set up for you which is nice. Says Windows 10, but actually comes with Windows 10 Pro which was nice since I'm also studying for Network+ and Security+. Works well gaming-wise. Customer service is prompt and useful when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Luft

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic PC especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this pc after my laptop finally died after 6 years. What an upgrade this is! It was super easy to set up- plug it in out of the box with windows and chrome already installed. So far I've tested Sims 4, fallout 4, left 4 dead, and Skyrim all with high quality graphics and no lag at all. If you want a gaming PC and don't want to build one, this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaPanda194

customer_reviews.title: It runs.. just on very low settings
customer_reviews.text: it'll run old gen and most of the popular games like warzone, apex legends, Master chief collection (Amazing btw) but at low quality settings.. im at the point where i should of just got a gaming laptop op even repurchased a PS4 or a switch instead of this.
customer_reviews.author: AJ.Dolo

customer_reviews.title: remove the glass and take out the padding and directions first
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this PC for the price. It runs my high graphic demanding vr games just fine. It came very padded and protected from shipping damage. I only wish the directions weren't on the inside of the computer and came with information like all the computers specs and stuff and some better setup directions. I plugged it in with them in there and didn't notice the switch was turned on so the computers fans came buzzing to life with them in there XD Had to switch it off quickly. Luckily nothing was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Runs smooth and is worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this beast. it takes everything I have thrown at it with ease. I have yet to have any problems running games. very demanding games like Wolcen, ARK, MASS Builder, MW5 Mercs and many many more. The only thing I would like to know is can I turn off all the LED lights? It does come with a very nice keyboard and mouse "wired" So my opinion being a PC gamer of 20yrs... if you can afford this grab it. you will not be let down. I will upload some pics soon. Bless you, all and stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great PC!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this gaming PC for a couple days and I can't believe how awesome it is. I can finally play all the PC games I've always wanted to without any hiccuping, frame loss or lag. The only regret I have is that I didn't buy it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Speedy for the price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this machine for gaming (minecraft/fortnite, etc.) and it hasn't disappointed. Startup is super fast and within less than a minute of logging onto windows you're ready to roll. Colors are really cool. So far 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tchamp

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a set for our teenage boys who are really into gaming, these are amazing. Easy to set up and little to no time for them to download all their Steam games. They have been set up for a few days now and there have been ZERO issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anita HJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Beat
customer_reviews.text: I love playing PC games but my laptop just can't keep up, so I decided to shop around for a gaming PC. As this is my first time buying a computer for gaming, I didn't want to go overboard and break the bank. After doing some research, this machine seemed like the best bang for my buck. And, so far, it has turned out to be awesome! My games load faster and run at fairly high settings. I am pleased with my purchase! If you're in the market for a gaming PC but are scared by some of the prices you see, this might be a great option for you!
customer_reviews.author: Charley Silvio

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Level
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd computer from SkyTech and it lives up to the prior two. This one was bought to replace my aging streaming computer and did not disappoint. The hardware is on the lower end for gaming, but still capable of playing most modern games on lower settings. So a good entry point into modern PC gaming. And great price for the hardware offered. Will always recommend them for anyone looking at a gaming rig.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: My son just purchased this as his first gaming PC. Our standard desktop had trouble running his games. He researched the different PCs out there with all of the different specs. He settled o this Skytech Gaming PC. The item arrived quickly and boxed securely. There were very clear quality instructions to set up the device and unbox the item. It was packed in a protective bag to keep the unit safe. The lights are great and have a remote. The unit fired right up and is playing games like Rainbow 6, Rust, Fortnight, and other games with ease. Great unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerod Michael Zahn

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Computer SERVICE STINKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product broke within days, wont boot up now, and has ports that dont do anything
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC for the price
customer_reviews.text: The SkyTech PC is great for all games and has had no problems. It shipped in a well protected box and even had a foam bag inside of it to keep everything safe. Easily the best gaming PC for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Burke

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this pc i bought one 7 months ago and it stopped working i contacted customer support they do not answer they put Me on hold for 30 minutes and just Hung up ive been trying to contact them for 3 weeks And nobody has helped i also contacted amazon because i bought through them they said they cant help at all they do not give any warranty do buy this pc unless you want to waist money on trash
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good computer. Minor issues with shipping
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with shipping but the seller responded quickly and was extremely helpful. Once the computer arrived the lights on the fan would only light up white. I tried tech support and had to leave my name and number. I still haven’t talked to them. I had some friends lol at it and figured out the fans were plugged in wrong. Now everything works excellent. Once that was handled I’m really happy with the computer. It’s an awesome computer for the price and my son is really happy with it and enjoys playing games on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with a faulty power supply after 27 days of using the PC. I contacted SkyTech Tech Support and within the hour they sent me an email with the shipping lable, paid for return shipping, replaced the PC for free and even upgraded the machine slightly. 10/10 will buy from them again next time I need a computer or parts.
customer_reviews.author: Karen O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: sent 8gb not 16gb version
customer_reviews.text: one would wonder how they could mix this up as it says it was checked by a person for quality assurance and still gave me the wrong version so I have to contact the manufacturer for a problem other than that it was packed well and snug in a Styrofoam bed so can't complain about everything but missing a stick of ram yeah I did complain
customer_reviews.author: joe stulz

customer_reviews.title: So good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it over a week now. Pretty good for the price and I am already eyeing upgrading the RAM to 15 or 32 gb. I will update this review again the day I have any issues with the PC just to give people an idea of how long it might last.
customer_reviews.author: Feramoo

customer_reviews.title: you will love it
customer_reviews.text: the best that can be bought for a good price, without words with the performance. Overall a nice build, and fully capable of playing modern games that I wanted to play. I haven't called their tech support since I had no problem, so far. Pros: 1. Runs well the performance was great in gears of war 5 2. Absolutely worth the price if you are not interested in building a computer yourself 3. The manufacturer cut costs in all the correct places so that your gaming experience is the focus
customer_reviews.author: otbinsanity

customer_reviews.title: No Issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: There was a bad review saying that they fans were extremely loud. They were, but there is an obvious switch of the power supply to turn it off lol. If you have any questions or concerns contact me. I've had this pc for a while now.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce fox

customer_reviews.title: Did have an issue with the mouse otherwise everything is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm happy with the PC itself and the way it runs. Set up was easy and the directions given were easy to follow. However, when the package arrived the mouse was broken when I took it out of the box. It became a real hassle trying to see if I could get a replacement mouse, having to contact support twice and having to call the manufacturer at one point. On a good note, support was very helpful and the issue was resolved which is why I'm giving an overall high rating.
customer_reviews.author: SHAHEEN ALAM

customer_reviews.title: A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It plays all the games I want it to, like Sub Nautica Below Zero flawlessy. It looks great, and runs smoothly no hiccups. I also use it for photo and video post processing and it meets my needs perfectly. A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: KAKKNAR STORMHAMMER

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great price!
customer_reviews.text: We are very impressed with this computer! It was quick and easy to set up. No bloatware bogging it down. Performance wise, it is surprisingly fast. The Sky Tech customer service is awesome as well. Fantastic value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Houston

customer_reviews.title: Runs smooth and fast. Shipping takes awhile.
customer_reviews.text: This product can get the job done on median settings or higher for most games. Rust has a hard time running but at low sittings it is playable at 70-80 FPS. My pc came in 5 days later than what was expected on shipping times. The keyboard that comes with the pc is very good if you are a fan of mechanical keyboards, the mouse on the other hand is plastic and not very good or reliable. Overall this pc is a solid rig I would recommend adding a solid state drive for shorter waiting times in games.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good but the WiFi connection.
customer_reviews.text: This pc is really good or decent for gaming, As long as you want an average of 60fps or over. Noise level isn’t loud and shouldn’t bother you while you game. I had one MAIN problem and it was the WiFi connection problem. My WiFi just constantly stays at 1 bar while other devices do not and it didn’t come with an antenna and other people said it was suppose too. but overall this pc is really great and a good budget pc if you are trying to not spend over 1000 with ur gaming setup I’m guessing.
customer_reviews.author: AlexZ.

customer_reviews.title: Correction on my previous review
customer_reviews.text: At first we couldn’t get the computer to work correctly. We tried troubleshooting but still nothing. It would power down as soon as we turned it on. I tried to return it but they refused. We finally got in touch with tech support and they found the problem. It is fixed and it’s working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Valz

customer_reviews.title: Solid PC
customer_reviews.text: Had a very frustrating time initially setting the PC up and came to find out there's supposed to be all sorts of paperwork included - just not with mine. Was able to find everything online but I'd already wasted hours screwing around before that. Real lack of attention by the company.
customer_reviews.author: Boxermom

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: I got nothing but love for this PC, I was nervous at first but when I got it and started playing games I loved it, only problem is that I was told it would have 1TB of storage and I only got 926GB
customer_reviews.author: Alexander_Fang

customer_reviews.title: Wont' get back to me despite that I want to buy 4 more of these
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e been trying to reach this company as I want to buy four more of these machines but their watts number doesn't work from Alaska and they don't answer emails. I'm going to give them just a few more days but if the first of July gets here I'll build the dam computers myself!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: This computer is fast, easy to setup, and great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son as he loves to play Pokemon, Minecraft, is on Discord, and a slew of others. This system is so much faster compared to the DELL he was using! What I love is the ease of setup, the price point, how quickly it arrived with our Prime Membership, the speed, and the fact we could add 2 years of a protection plan. Gamers are pretty hard on their equipment - or at least my son is. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lemoi

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and runs windows 10 like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: The computer came fast and was super easy to set up. its got more than enough power to run windows 10. I would have liked to see some USB type C ports but not then end of the world. over all I would recommend it to anyone who is thinking about getting into gaming on a PC without spending the big bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Justin & Maryna

customer_reviews.title: No powering piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pissed. This thing didn't even come out of the box working. I got this for my son; he was so excited, only to plug it in and it never powered up. I tried and talked to customer service for HOURS and they were no help. Absolutely no recompense for the heartache and inconvenience, especially on Amazon's part.
customer_reviews.author: pip

customer_reviews.title: This PC does everything I need it to do plus more.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC to use for streaming. I'm able to run streamlabs perfectly without and issues and it also runs games very well. It runs fortnite perfectly. For this to be a prebuilt PC I was very pleased with how it performs.Overall it was a great purchase. Only con was the display picture shows the led lights on the cooling fan on the inside case. Mine does not have the lights on the inside. But that has been the only con. Other than that the PC works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: VIDEO CARD STOPPED WORKING AFTER 6 MONTHS. CALLED, EMAILED, CONTACTED SELLER SEVERAL TIME. NO RESPONSE. PLEASE CALL ME AND FIX THIS ISSUE IF YOU WANT AN UPDATED REVIEW. I HAVE BOUGHT 4 OF YOUR COMPUTERS SO FAR!!! 2 OF THEM WORK FINE. 1 OF THEM THE VIDEO CARD BROKE. 1 OF THEM THE WIFI STOPPED WORKING AND I HAVE TO HARDWIRE IT AFTER 1 MONTH. PLEASE CONTACT ME ASAP TO RESOLVE.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Best pc I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Mac person but I traded in my Mac for way below market value to get this for my son who’s I’ve every weekend. I will never change my mind about macs but will say this pc is worth twice what I paid for it. It’s gas smooth and very responsive. The lights are cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven F.

customer_reviews.title: Bad hard drive, TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Within hours of having it had a bunch of issues with the hard drive had to send it back to get a new one. Took a long time to get the replacement back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Demauro

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away by this PC, especially considering the price. I was skeptical when I ordered it but really glad I did. It was packaged extremely well and had foam inside the case to keep everything in place. The components are nice and even has a legit Thermaltake case and PS. Been using it for two weeks now and it runs fast and consistent without a single issue yet, despite pushing it pretty hard. Running it with a 42" Samsung 4K UHD and the GTX 1050 Ti has been doing the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Cory L.

customer_reviews.title: decent rig for its price.
customer_reviews.text: i got this during the christmas holidays and its just a fairly decent enough computer. im not an expert but it seems most of the people who comment the reviews know their stuff better than i. I will say though ive had for roughly 5 months now and have had no issues with it whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Beechler

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming computer at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson for Christmas. His old computer needed to be replaced or upgraded. This was the most reasonable way to go. Very fast delivery, I ordered it on December 11th and it was delivered on December 14th. He loves it. It is very quiet but powerful. He likes the lights and the glass case. His games are not sluggish anymore. Hopefully he also uses it for schoolwork.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Briddes

customer_reviews.title: My kid's first gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for about 3 months and so far so good. He loves it, performs great, no lag, or technical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Invalidi

product_meta.title: SkyTech Blaze - Gaming Computer PC Desktop – Ryzen 5 1600 6-Core 3.2 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, 1TB HDD, 16GB DDR4, AC WiFi, Windows 10 Home 64-bit (16GB Version)
product_meta.description:
Size:Ryzen 1600 | 16GB | GTX 1050 TIWhy settle for mediocrity? Leap forward into SkyTech Blaze series with the newest architectures from AMD and NVIDIA. Powered by AMD Ryzen 5 Chipset, this 6-core processor delivers great performance with a base speed of 3. 2 Ghz. SkyTech Blaze delivers the best price performance value gaming rig in the market. The SkyTech Blaze offers the best budget gaming computer built up to date with the AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Processor and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4G Graphic Card that can easily run popular games such as Fortnite, CS: GO, LOL, APEX Legends at 60 FPS+ 1080P at high setting. Specification Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 6-Core 3. 2 GHz (3. 6 GHz Turbo) processor Motherboard: A320M Motherboard Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB Video Card (Brand may varies) Memory: 16GB DDR4 2400 Gaming Memory with Heat Spreader Power Supply: 500 Watt 80 PLUS Certified Power Supply HDD: 1TB 7200 RPM HDD Operating System: Microsoft Windows 10 Home 64-bit Case: Thermaltake Versa H18 Tempered Glass Mid Tower Case 

Product images used on this page are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the exact components used at the time of manufacture. Component makes and models may vary from depictions of the product in product images but will adhere to the specification outlined in the main description of the product. Particulars such as I/O ports may vary. Please contact us for more details.
feature_bullets: Ryzen 5 1600 6-Core 3.2 GHz (3.6 GHz Turbo) | 1 TB 7200RPM Hard Drive | A320M Motherboard
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB GDDR5 Video Card | 16GB Gaming Memory DDR4 2400 with Heat Spreader | Windows 10 Home 64-bit
PCIe AC Wi-Fi with Antenna | No bloatware | 1 x DVI, 1 x Display Port (Version 1.4) | 1 x HDMI | 4 x USB 3.1 Gen1 Ports,4 x USB 2.0, 1 x USB 3.0 | HD Audio and Mic

3 x 120mm Front Red LED Fans for Maximum Air Flow, 1 x 120mm Non-LED Back Fan | 1 x Cooler Master CPU Red Led Heatsink for Extreme Cooling (Not Stock Heatsink) | Powered by 80 Plus Certified 500 Watt Power Supply
Thermaltake H18 Tempered Glass Case | Free RGB Keyboard & Mouse | 1 Year Warranty on Parts and Labor | Lifetime Free Technical Support | Assemble in the USA
